title: [Medicine] Johns Hopkins study supports potential for injectable ‘chemical vaccine’ for malaria using atovaquone. Researchers demonstrate in mouse model that key mutation that renders malaria parasites resistant to atovaquone also makes them non-transmissible via mosquitoes

[Health] Pupil response may shed light on who responds best to transcranial magnetic stimulation for depression | New studies suggest that the “window to the soul” may give a glimpse into the brain in depression
